Get test tokens

This page explains how to get SOL and demo tokens for devnet.

0) Install a wallet

You need a Solana wallet browser extension. Recommended:

  • Install Solflare

1) Get SOL (needed for fees)

Use the official Solana faucet for devnet/testnet:

  • https://faucet.solana.com

2) Get project tokens (USDC / GOV)

In this project, USDC/GOV are SPL tokens on devnet. There is usually no universal faucet for arbitrary SPL mints. For testing we recommend one of the options:

  • Ask the operator to send you test USDC/GOV for your wallet address.
  • If you control the mint authority, mint tokens to your wallet (CLI: spl-token mint).

Configured addresses

RPC: https://api.devnet.solana.com
Program: ErfuhJxxpHNKviT5LCnupGhSUbXpjfRThxikEgb94aDt
USDC mint: 9sNnTsxUPfLApmVzcoyA64VoaPhdCLynfQTM33hDfNdL
GOV mint: GrSGzfP8B7fpbiE4mAAJRxW3bvvumdAXiBYb84ggt1Jk

3) Next step

Go back to Roulette, connect your wallet, place a bet, wait for VRF, then press SPIN.
